item.title: PHP Contact Form HELP!
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

Take the post variables ($_POST) and run them through some sort of cleaning process, then transfer them to the database somehow. ;D

item.title: PHP Contact Form HELP!
item.dc:creator: @DevilXsummoner DevilXsummoner
item.description:
@DevilXsummoner wrote:

Ima noob. I know it. I want the contact form to work.

HTML:

[code]

                    <div class="row">

                        <div class="col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12">

                            <div class="row">

                                <div class="col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12">

                                	<label for="cf_name">Your Name:</label>

                                    <input type="text" name="cf_name" id="cf_name" class="sb_input">

                                </div>

                                <div class="col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12">

                                	<label for="cf_lastName">Your Lastname:</label>

                                    <input name="cf_lastName" id="cf_lastName" class="sb_input">

                                </div>

                                <div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">

                                	<label for="cf_email">Your Email:</label>

                                    <input type="text" name="cf_email" id="cf_email" class="sb_input">

                                </div>

                                <div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">

                                	<label for="cf_subject">Subject:</label>

                                    <input type="text" name="cf_subject" id="cf_subject" class="sb_input">

                                </div>

                            </div><!--row-->

                            

                        </div><!--col-->

                        <div class="col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12">

                        	<label for="cf_message">Your Message:</label>

                            <textarea name="cf_message" id="cf_message" class="sb_input"></textarea>

                        </div><!--col-->

                    </div><!--row-->

                    <button id="cf_submit" name="cf_submit" type="submit">SEND MESSAGE</button>

                 </form>[/code]

Now I need the PHP which I suck at. If somebody can help me I will love you forever.

Read full topic
